name: GLFW.NET
short_description:
GLFW.NET is a .NET wrapper for GLFW. GLFW is very easy to use library, but now it's available for the .NET platform! Just include the GLFW.NET DLL into your project, add the C GLFW DLL into your program's folder, and now you have it!

I also simplified the library by making a standalone easy to use class for the keyboard input, also another class for the mouse input.

With miner changes to the the library, this is a great place to start out for anyone who want to learn GLFW for C++, or even if you want to just stick with GLFW.NET.
